text: Coat of arms of the Lordship of Stargard The Lordship of Stargard (German: Herrschaft Stargard, Stargarder Land or Land Stargard) was a county first set up in the 13th century as the terra Stargardiensis and first documented in the area of the border between Brandenburg, Pomerania and Mecklenburg. ==See also== *Mecklenburg-Stargard *Battle of Gransee, fought in 1316 between Mecklenburger and Brandenburger armies over rights to the Lordship. ==External links== * landesbibliographie-mv.de category:History of Mecklenburg category:Countships category:13th century in Germany
title: Lordship of Stargard
